author: arkurth
msg: Updated vSphere_SDK.pm to check the resultant vmdk file name after cloning a VM in copy_virtual_disk. With vSphere SDK 5.5 and possibly other versions, the file may be named something like copy-000001.vmdk instead of copy.vmdk. If it detects this, the vmdk is renamed.

author: djencks
msg: [FELIX-4563] Turn xml reference target attributes into properties, with a test

author: djencks
msg: [FELIX-4402] fix determination of reason for deactivation when configuration is deleted

author: arkurth
msg: Added module table entries for ManagementNode.pm to vcl.sql and update-vcl.sql. This allows 'vcld -setup' options defined within ManagementNode.pm to appear.
